data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_usage IS NULL OR cpu_usage < 85) AND (private_memory_usage IS NULL OR private_memory_usage < 85) AND (status IS NULL OR status = 'Started')) AS 'Health Score' FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_website FACET microsoft_internetinformationservices_website_name

presentation.title: Web Server Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Web Server of this Website

presentation.title: Enabled Protocols Distribution
presentation.notes: Specifies the protocols that requests can use to access an application.

data.nrql: SELECT average(active_requests) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_website COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Active Requests
presentation.notes: The number of requests that are currently being processed by the website.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_usage) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_website COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percentage of CPU being used by website processes.

data.nrql: SELECT average(private_memory_usage) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_website COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Private Memory Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percentage of system memory currently used as website process private bytes.

data.nrql: SELECT average(current_connections) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_website COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Current Connections
presentation.notes: The number of active connections that are open on the website.

data.nrql: SELECT average(io_operations) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_website COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: I/O Operations (Operations)
presentation.notes: The number of read and write operations performed by all application pool processes in the last second.
